name: The Constant learner
body:
# Learning

*Learning is the lasting change in behavior that results from experience*

-----

On this site I am going to write about my adventures with learning while discussing the best methods and practices that facilitate learning various kinds of study subjects. 

![Learning](http://www.trainingzone.co.uk/sites/default/files/styles/540x350/public/istockphoto_thinkstock_story_birds.jpg)

## Author

**Lakshminarayanan Sadagopan**
- <https://github.com/laxmynarain>
- <https://twitter.com/lsadagopan>
